schema.description: Mod changelog entries grouped by year, sorted newest first

updates: Updated to 1.26.0
notes: This is a 1.#.0 update, which means there may be new bugs, new things not working
Please check online for vanilla bugs first before writing mod bug reports
Tested with and without the event and everything seems to run fine, didn't get any crashes and the event seems to work with the mod

fixes: Fix for Survivor difficulty using Apex Predator pathway skin without armor
This was due to updating the code from an official update and a bad github push

updates: Updated to 1.25.4

newModule: Disable Official Events: Backend way of turning off events that didn't work before
Recommended this module is always added to mod selections
fixes: Fix for backpack clipping on Dooms Day Prepper

restoration: Restoration of custom Chaos spawn system - An official update broke the functionality
This system makes a huge impact on Ultimate and Insanity difficulties, along with the Warzones and Infestation modules
Restoration of the Swamp Biome - An official update broke a lot of custom infected for the biome
newContent: Added new Demolishers, Screamers, and Spitters to the Swamp biome

fixes: Fix for LevelsBeGone crash due to update

updates: Updated to 1.25.2
notes: Due to the ongoing event, please play in offline mode to avoid large parts of the mod not working due to events potentially being forced

updates: Updated to 1.25.1
notes: This update was binary, not the data files
There is a known crash happening due to Techlands latest event code
If you're able to successfully switch to offline mode, then you will be able to play the mod

updates: Updated to 1.25.0
notes: The last few official events have been forced, even if you set it to off in the Options menu
Parts of the mod may not work properly without switching to offline mode

removedModules: Removed Hunger & Thirst from Module list due to an official update removing the concept of stamina from basic movement
fixes: Fix for water adding a stamina regen buff without having Hunger and Thirst installed

newModule: Physics Overhaul: All changes from the physics and reactions system have been made into an optional module
newEvents: HyperMode: Based on Techlands Hypermode, built around new ragdoll code. Enemies will blast away with your attacks
Low Gravity: The player and all enemies now have low gravity set
5479 Days Later: Based on 28 Days Later movie, all spawns are Biters and Virals hunting human survivors at all times
notes: Winter Slaughterland has been moved from Modules to Events
All Physics events are compatible with each other

updates: Updated to 1.24.2
newModule: Levels Be Gone: Flattens all tier systems in the game, makes all weapons and enemies do the same damage and have the same health
physicsOverhaul: Went back to Dying Light 1 and combed through all physics code to dial in DL2
Enemies are more likely to ragdoll with hits
Enemies will bump into each other and knock each other down
Enemies will ragdoll when on the ground or dead
Enemies better naturally respond to hits in different areas of the body
firearmsRebalance: All firearms dialed in to feel more natural based on their attributes
Shotguns no longer able to snipe enemies across the map
Firearms now cause enemies to wake up and come find you around the map
Enemies will start to build up from around the maps edges

updates: Updated to 1.24.1
notes: This update caused serious frame loss, fixed by updating the Nvidia driver
New modules on the way soon and potentially an event

updates: Updated to 1.24.0
fixes: Fix for Biters climbing - biters walking around and then climbing up the side of buildings or climbing down without animations has been fixed
notes: For all difficulties, you can change the runners and climbers using the Mod config > NPC Settings > Behavior Settings

features: Added more custom IALR bows and crossbows to traders around the world
fixes: Fix for Balatro Content quest bug (found by community member Beatoriche)
Fix for loot bugs - order of loot items causing random issues
Small Fixes for NPC AI
Fix for companion costs - some purchases were still set to original testing prices

updates: Updated to 1.23.2
notes: The new official update was a very small hotfix released by Techland

updates: Updated to 1.23.1
fixes: Fix for Warzones - Removes issues where players were seeing enemy LODs but no enemies would show up in the distance
notes: There seems to be a new and ongoing multiplayer bug after the 1.23.0 update (vanilla bug)

updates: Updated to 1.23.0
fixes: Fix for spawn bug - fixed a larger balancing bug with spawning in the mod that broke a while back
Fix for missing Crossbows and Bows - Added back to traders around the world
You can find more Crossbows at the PK traders than survivors

newContent: Added 16 new custom female PK bowmen/soldiers to the world - hand crafted new models
fixes: Fixes the invisible PK bug reported
Fix for Apex Predator First person view - Updated to properly show the torso with Apex Predator armor
Fix for Auto-aim bug reported
notes: Weapon clipping can still be an issue with Apex Predator armor and skin (no known fix currently)

removed: Removed the outdated crafting system - IALR crafting changes to vanilla systems removed until proper balancing
Removed the vanilla periodic spawn system for virals on Casual, Survivor, and Ultimate
notes: The periodic viral spawn system just randomly throws virals at the player, not needed with the mod's world-based spawning

fixes: Small bugfix for reported Loot bug on Nexusmods

updates: Updated to support 1.22.5
fixes: Fix for damage not properly scaling when adding mods to weapons (syntax bug)
Fix for stash module causing errors
balance: Rebalancing of loot tables to have a few more items on biters and virals beyond just camo
Removed glowsticks and flares from showing up at shops
Rebalanced traders to have more accessories from the mod

updates: Updated to support 1.22.4
newFeature: New Camo Conversion system - Combine different camos into new and stronger blends using new craft blueprints found in Stash Extras
New camo blends found at shops
balance: Reduced amount of initial Volatiles in world and chases for Casual Survivor until level 2 & 3
Added back Fuel Bombs and Fire Bombs - Easier to find at shops and cost less to make
Fixes for large number of Nocturnal weapon drops - Rebalanced loot
Fix for Grip bug - grip and reinforcement mods should show back up now
lootBalance: Rebalanced glowstick and signal flares showing up in the world and at traders
Rebalanced infected to be more likely to drop camouflage and contain less jewelry and cash
Rebalanced Small trophies to be more likely to show up

updates: Updated to support 1.22.3
Updated to support 1.22.2
Updated to support 1.22.0
fixes: Fix for Tower Raids Shop bug
notes: Techland added new code for throwing weapons, which means all custom throwing weapons may be broken

features: Hunger & Thirst Inventory slot Count support - Can properly adjust numbers inside mod config for Weapons, Equipment, Consumables, and Ammo slots

fixes: Hotfix for broken containers showing up in the world

modConfig: Cleaned up and improved the ModConfig data in the new Launcher
Added back Inventory settings - can now adjust slots for Weapons, Equipment, Consumables, and Ammo
features: Added Language support to new Infected Hud
Reduced distance for the hud to show
languages: Updated all Language support packs with more player contributions
fixes: Fix for chaos system working too close to the player
notes: Please backup savegames - inventory settings are a known corruption issue when setting custom values

updates: Updated to 1.21.5c - Minor fixes for Tower Raids
newInfected: Release of Enraged, Viral, and Armored variants of Charger, Goon, and Demolisher
Enraged will attempt to run you down but can't climb
Viral can climb and jump between buildings
Armored are undead Dreadnaughts - think 'Juggernaut' with hud health bar
Alpha Volatiles also have a chance to spawn with hud health bar
Chemical and Venom variants now have Hud displays
features: Restored Running in Bases - may not work on all of them
balance: Alcohol is now stored in Inventory again based on feedback

features: Base building content added back to traders
Deployable UV light kits and PK reinforcements can be found at PK traders
fixes: Fix for IALR Survivor Sense - Mod config will now properly toggle the visuals (broken due to official update)
notes: Please submit bug reports for issues - developer relies on community to create bug reports

fixes: Hotfix for food/drink items getting stuck in Weapon slots after refactor

refactor: Refactor for all food, alcohol, and water
Updated all animations and buffs for the mod for both base game and Hunger and Thirst module
Player will now properly eat or drink items
All food, water, and alcohol are instant consume on the base mod
Some items are instant consume on Hunger and Thirst (perishable), while cans and smoked foods go into inventory
fixes: Fix for Hunger and Thirst bug with consuming food and not adding stamina
Fixes for all firearms - missing audio, animations, etc
stashModule: Added multiple firearm bundles to the stash module
fixes2: Infinite stamina fix - Patched issue with consuming food items after last update
All food should now properly heal only without Hunger & Thirst Module

features: Instant consume food items - All food found around the world (without Hunger & Thirst module) will drop out of inventory and be instantly consumed for small percentage of health
Food items continue to be stored in inventory with Hunger & Thirst module
balance: Nerfed Volatile difficulty and spawn rates for Survivor - Reduced large volume of Volatiles spawning during chases
Can still adjust amounts in Mod Config Chase section
fixes: Fix for health regen on Hunger & Thirst module

updates: Updated to 1.21.4
fixes: Potential fix for Large ammo boxes being un-lootable

languages: Updated Language packs to include the latest translations
Huge shoutout to Reclord for finishing translations for IALR in Turkish
fixes: Fix for Crafting menu options - feature temp removed to better support official changes

majorUpdate: 1.6 Released - Fresh start after extended pre-release cycle
newSkins: New DoomsDay Prepper and Apex Predator Skins - start a new game with these pathways or equip from Stash Extras section
Skins work under outfits and are completely FPP compatible
towerRaids: TowerRaids virals and biters added to the world spawns
languages: IALR now supports 14 languages in Dying Light 2
Added support for 6 new languages: Arabic, Chinese, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, and Russian
Large majority still done by Google Translate but it's a start
Overhaul to all languages - new tools for converting translations from Language translation excel into the game
All languages now have special characters
Still struggling to get Russian, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese working
fixes: Fix for The Raid Quest - AI behavior issue after official update 1.21.0 with AI walking towards player
Fix for The Stash Module - Techland removed code needed, temp work around implemented

updates: Updated to 1.21.3
notes: Some players may still be experiencing issue with renegade enemies running at player and not attacking after 1.21.1 update

updates: Updated to 1.21.2 - This update made inventory changes so grab latest version to prevent savegame corruption
fixes: Fixes to child biters - missing arms and hands fixed

towerRaids: Support for TowerRaids - biters and enemies should properly work now
May want to play Tower Raids on Casual Survivor as it will be hard with the mod
fixes: Fix for more AI issues - distance calculation for AI for humans, demolishers, goons, and volatiles (during the day)
Fix for Stash items - fixed several starter bundles, Trophy Conversion bundle, and other IALR start bundles to work as 1 time use
Human AI bug hotfix - This latest update refactored a lot of XML code which deeply affects NPC AI

updates: Updated to support 1.21.1
balance: Reduced the Volatile spawns on Survivor difficulty
Removed Volatile Chemical and Venom variants from Survivor
modules: Removed Custom Map Changes Module - very outdated and needs to be remade
notes: Update 1.21.1 introduced a large change to all AI and how the XML calculates AI movement

fixes: Potential fix for daytime crashes after official update - took a lot of trial and error but able to run through city without crashes
launcher: New launcher update with lots of fixes
modConfig: Updated all IAL_Settings.mth's across all difficulties to use the new generated file from the launcher

updates: Updated to support 1.21.0
fixes: Fix for VolatilesBeGone to now properly remove all roaming Volatiles - please play on Casual or Survivor for this to work with all other features
Fix for PK troops not using UV flares
Fix for human AI not properly spotting and attacking enemies - Humans are much more aggressive towards biters
removed: Removed random UV lights showing up all over some parts of the city - too easy to farm currently
models: Reworked the PK visuals to use more of the original colors (less bright blue) and added 36 new looks for patrolling PK
Fixes for some visual glitches with biters, clipping through other materials

updates: Updated to support 1.20.1
notes: Make sure to run the installer again to make sure the update applies when it downloads on the launcher

updates: Mod updated to 1.6pre15
fixes: Fix for the update process, new autoinstaller feature implemented
Fix for a large number of small bugs and glitched visuals on the new infected

updates: Updated to 1.19.3
newContent: Added 75 new biters, slowly bringing back the custom infected
fixes: Fix for infestation crash
Fix for Vanilla + IALR Content blob

updates: Updated to 1.19.2
notes: Developer was working on a gamejam for 7 days, now back working on launcher and 1.6

updates: Updated to 1.19.1
fixes: Fix for biters climbing after 1.19.0 on Ultimate and Insanity and through the Mod config
Fix for virals attacking the player
Fix for language modules not working properly - large overhaul coming with 1.6

updates: Updated to 1.19.0 - generated around 75% with auto-heal code but still has ways to go
chaosSystem: Improved Chaos system - helps remove enemies spawning directly in front of player
Events should now take place further away from player
Horde may be waiting around a corner or inside an interior
fixes: Fixes for spawn bugs - spawn issue with large amounts of volatiles and enemies constantly spawning in interiors after update
Fixes for shops and inventory - found small bugs using new Unofficial Dev Tools

updates: Updated to support 1.18.0
Updated to 1.17.2
fixes: Fix for Vanilla bug in loot tables for Walkie-Talkies due to vanilla typo
notes: Confirmed PK Summons, Traders, companions, and other tools are working
If having issues, run File Verification on game, remove all other mods, and install only IALR using the IALR Launcher Installer

updates: Updated to support 1.17.0.1
newModule: Added New Module: Stash Unlock - provides all IALR content immediately in stash (not recommended for newcomers)
newPathway: Added New Pathway: Apex Predator - skip ahead and get cooler items, adds all skills and higher level options from start (not recommended for newcomers)
Recommended to skip prologue with Apex Predator to avoid tutorial bug softlock
features: Added support for Nightmare difficulty to Survivor Options: Thirst and Hunger
patreon: Releasing Patreon Thank You pack content to everyone as it was never meant to be a paywall

updates: Updated to support 1.19.2
notes: Pushing hard to have the new launcher and 1.6 done by the end of this month

updates: Updated to 1.16.1
fixes: Fix for outdated crafting items not having names (by removing them for now)
Removed continuous enemy spawns in Casual Survivor and Survivor difficulty - Survivor has enough challenges with increased spawns
notes: Survival Options - Hunger and Thirst module does not currently support Nightmare difficulty due to new 'advanced/tactical stamina' update after 1.16.0
Switch to Hard difficulty if using that module

updates: Updated to 1.16
Updated to support Nightmare difficulty
All modules, events, pathways, and languages have been updated to support the 1.16 update
fixes: Fix for Pathway selections PK, Veteran, and Roadwarrior to support a new skin when starting a new game
Armor that had clipping issues was removed from the starting character
knownBugs: Armor clipping is still an issue with all custom armors (still no fix in sight)
Custom Maps Optional still has the Sofia bug when trying to continue the quest
Some savegames seem to have the wrong flashlight settings baked in

newContent: Added new Veteran skin to Stash for all players and to the Veteran Pathway
fixes: Fix for IALR_Content difficulty having a stamina bug
notes: Skin is compatible with most ingame outfit pieces and easy to enable and disable

updates: Updated the mod to support 1.15.4
fixes: Fix for spawns on Insanity to fix roaming Volatiles - camouflage is now 100% required for movement at night
Everything can smell and track you across the map
Fix for some biters always running even with Mod Config settings set to Walker
Fix for warzone like spawns occurring throughout the city - city spawns have been better balanced
Fix for Volatile health being super tanky - due to a repeat value in preset
Fix for Biter_Fresh running or walking being set by the config - can now easily set all Biters to run and climb or walk through Mod config
Fix for crash from VolatilesBeGone module
Fix for Invisible Virals - All IALR Models have now been removed for the Infected, being redesigned for 1.6 release
Fix for Reinforcements now spawning from different factions - had to be re-written after 1.15 update
notes: Added description when loading IALR Content warning that 70% of features are disabled in that difficulty setting

balance: Infestation has been rebalanced to focus on more infected and less humans spawning in the world
Patrols and new factions still randomly in world, but more spawns focused on Biters and infected
fixes: Fix for black screen crash when starting a new save
Fix for crashes with Deadly Humans, Infestation, and Survivor Module
Updated all modules with 1.6pre changes and improved balancing

updates: Updated to 1.15.3
spawnSystem: Refactor for balancing for all difficulties to improve spawn systems and fix bugs
Spawns have been rebalanced to bring the most populated map yet
If performance issues, use Mod Config > World Spawns > Performance tab to adjust IAL_Spawn_Max_AI_Count (default 120) and IAL_Spawn_Max_AI_Zombie_Spawn_Distance (default 80)
firearms: Firearms can now be traded, dropped, and added to the stash
Firearms have received balancing updates to make damage more appropriate
5 new Firearms in development - available through patreon stash content for Insanity and Ultimate supporters
insanity: Insanity difficulty completely refactored to be most difficult to date
Enemies can now smell you, even high up on buildings
Best way to avoid being slaughtered is using Camouflage as you move
interiorSpawns: Interior Spawns working again with custom spawns
Updated to 'self activate' so no longer have to walk into interior to make AI search for you
Makes them much more deadly but may increase performance costs
modConfig: Removed Inventory slots - should not be set unless willing to risk savegame corruption
Removed FOV Camera setting (AntiFov is set to 0.0 in the mod)

fixes: Resolved crash caused by Banshee Stalker AI
Restored IALR spawn systems
Restored interior spawn systems
Improved savegame stability and corruption prevention
notes: Savegames now store more persistent data; switching between modded and vanilla gameplay may cause corruption
Recommended to use IALR_Content difficulty when playing vanilla to prevent savegame damage

updates: Updated mod to support Dying Light 2 version 1.15.2
Compatibility fixes for latest game patch

fixes: Resolved spawn crash caused by PK Shieldbearer AI
Restored all enemy types to spawn system
Fixed backend compatibility issues with game update

stability: Addressed random crashes in spawn code
Identified vanilla game bugs affecting module stability
Warzones and Infestation modules temporarily unstable pending fixes
Base mod configuration most stable option

restoration: Restored Day Hunter and Night Hunter systems for Ultimate and Insanity difficulties
Rebuilt spawn system for each difficulty
fixes: Fixed crash related to new firearm events
Temporarily removed custom biter visuals and special infected pending version 1.6
Resolved crash caused by Deadly Humans module

majorUpdate: Updated to support Dying Light 2 version 1.15.1
Added firearms to Pathways (Veteran starts with pistol, DoomsDayPrepper starts with pistol and rifle)
moduleUpdates: Infestation: Increased infected damage, faster Volatiles, increased spawn frequency
Deadly Humans: Enhanced enemy intelligence and lethality at lower levels
Casual Survivor: Removed daytime Volatile street spawns, reduced Volatile difficulty
maintenance: Manually updated all IALR custom Biter and Viral models for compatibility

features: Added scaling tier system for Biters, Virals, and special infected to address one-shot kills at late game
fixes: Improved fix for 'Unable to do quest, enemies nearby' issue
Fixed Screamer causing player death when screaming
Restored electrical effects in game

survivalOptions: Eating and drinking provides immediate stamina boost based on food quality
Rooftop water collection now grants stamina boost during collection
volatilesBeGoneModule: Enhanced code to further eliminate Volatile spawns

spawnSystemRefactor: Complete rebuild of daytime spawn system
New Mod Config controls for spawn density and distribution
Spawn Horde size configuration (min/max enemies per group)
Density distance controls for horde spacing
Global spawn density controls for area coverage
Performance tab for spawn limits and physics settings
newModules: Infestation: Infected roam freely during daytime, no longer affected by sunlight (incompatible with Warzones)
Deadly Humans: Significantly enhanced human enemy difficulty
Remove Volatiles: Casual Survivor settings without Volatiles (incompatible with Warzones and Infestation)
Remove Weapon Mod Visuals: Eliminates weapon attachment visuals
configurations: New local configs for Medium and Large horde sizes
All biters as runners and climbers config
balance: Increased time between hunger and thirst requirements in Survival Options
Added rooftop rain collectors for water refills

fixes: Added UV Lights to PK encounters for improved world logic
Attempted fix for 'Enemies Nearby, cannot activate' quest bug
Fixed PK Reinforcements not spawning when beacons thrown
Resolved green interior bug and graphics glitching
Fixed IALR Content mode companion and PK reinforcement spawning
Corrected Bow damage display and damage application
Fixed weather visual glitch in Winter Slaughter-Land module

newModule: Winter Slaughter-Land: Transforms map to winter setting with new weather conditions (clear, light snow, snow, snow with rain, blizzard)

fixes: Minor fixes to Human AI behavior
Code review improvements
Crash investigation for event-disabled gameplay
Human AI behavior improvements
Minor code corrections

humanAIRefactor: NPCs now utilize parkour elements (buildings, cars, signs)
Improved enemy avoidance and survival tactics
Level-based scaling for companion weapons, stamina, and health
Defensive movement patterns while tracking player
Reduced road usage in favor of parkour traversal
balance: Reduced Chaos spawn frequency on Survivor difficulty
Updated zone-specific enemy patrols and spawns
fixes: Bandages now function as healing items instead of consumables

newModule: Survival Options: Hunger and Thirst - Stamina no longer automatically regenerates
Health regeneration disabled on empty stomach
Food consumption required for stamina regeneration
20 new food items added to world
Food items provide health and stamina benefits
Savegame backup strongly recommended before enabling
features: All custom Crossbows, Bows, and Flamethrowers now repairable at shops
fixes: Restored IALR Traders functionality
Resolved loot system bug when playing without event active

newFeatures: Trophy Exchange system repair and crafting recipe additions
languages: Updated French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, and Spanish translations

updates: Updated to support Dying Light 2 version 1.13.3
balance: Adjusted Survivor difficulty Volatile spawns
knownIssues: Noise and reinforcement spawn systems temporarily offline
Day Hunter, Volatile, Howler, and Night Hunter systems being restored

fixes: Updated instant heal consumables for new item compatibility
Fixed Bow and Crossbow draw mechanics
Prevented Volatile Hives from spawning outdoors
balance: Reduced Goon and Demolisher Chaos agents on Ultimate difficulty
Decreased overall Chaos frequency on Survivor difficulty

chaosSystemBalance: Removed 8 difficult agents from Survivor difficulty
Removed all Chaos agents from Casual Survivor difficulty
Reduced agent spawn rates for Survivor, Ultimate, and Insanity
Warzones module recommended for maximum Chaos gameplay
fixes: Updated companion spawn mechanics

warzonesRefactor: Larger enemy forces and new patrol systems
Factions: Bandits, Renegades, PK, PK Commandos, Colonel's Men, Colonel's Commandos, Wolves, WorldBurners, Survivors
Special spawns: Volatile packs, Hives, Demolishers, Goons, Hordes
difficultyImprovements: Rebalanced Survivor, Ultimate, and Insanity using Chaos systems
Enhanced world atmosphere and danger levels

newChaosSystem: 9 AI Chaos agents for random epic encounters
AI Director-inspired spawn system (Left 4 Dead style)
First phase implementation with ongoing refinement
volatiles: Rebalanced spawn frequency across all difficulties
Mix of Chase-initiating and pack-summoning Volatiles
ialrLootSystem: Option to disable IALR items in Mod Config
fixes: Resolved audio event bugs from version 1.13.0
knownIssues: For Honor event may cause inventory glitches
Spawn systems not functional with event enabled
Best experience with event disabled

updates: Updated to support Dying Light 2 version 1.13.0 hotfix
knownIssues: Loot system Mod Config options temporarily disabled due to version 1.13.0 bug
Noise system and Daystalker/Night stalker spawn system under investigation
Some invisible zombies may have returned

difficultyRebalancing: Fresh rebalance across all difficulty levels
volatiles: Volatiles now always initiate Hunt/Chase events
visualChanges: Removed visual effects from Biters and Infected
fixes: Resolved inventory size crash when modified in Mod Config
Corrected human melee enemy damage values

chaosSystemBalance: Removed 8 difficult agents from Survivor difficulty
Removed all Chaos agents from Casual Survivor
Reduced overall agent spawn frequency across all difficulties
Warzones module provides maximum Chaos experience
fixes: Updated companion spawn code for version 1.13.0 compatibility
Corrected Casual Survivor spawn bug (no zombies issue)

majorUpdate: Updated to support Dying Light 2 version 1.13.0
IALR Halloween event live (Killer Clowns and Vampires)
Two Vampire tiers with red eyes and enhanced speed
difficultyAdjustments: Insanity and Ultimate: Increased Volatile spawns and tracking
Heavy armor movement fixes for directional and inverted movement
fixes: Resolved NG+ crash
Fixed spawn issues for multiple modules and pathways
eventNote: Compatibility patch required for Winter Tales event
Crashes may occur without event compatibility installation

majorUpdate: IALR Armorer: 240 new Gold tier armors
100 new Platinum tier armors
Unique skills for each armor piece
New Torsoaddon (Bracer slot) and helmet armors
Weight system (Light, Medium, Heavy armor)
IALR Armorer trader added to Stash
Random world armor drops
statSystem: Quick stat summary display for each armor
hordeSystem: New Mod Config Performance and Horde tabs
Performance tab: Enemy count, distance, and physics controls
Horde tab: Min/max daytime horde size configuration
Two new horde configurations (Medium and Large)
All biters as runners and climbers config
fixes: Reduced global gas tank explosion frequency
Updated mine explosive damage to limbs and body parts

newSurvivorSenseSystem: Custom colors for each infected type
Individual color configuration for major infected groups
modConfigToolEnhancements: New Color Picker feature for custom color creation
Forced value type validation (Float, INT, String, Boolean)
'Changed to >' value display for error checking
uiSettings: Saved as part of Mod Config
mergeConfigFeature: Merge single or multiple local configs
Easy difficulty switching with custom settings preservation
additionalFeatures: Delete Configs buttons for config management
fixes: Reduced Volatile spawns in Casual Survivor and Survivor at night

majorUpdates: Updated to support Dying Light 2 version 1.12.1
Pathways now compatible with Skip Prologue feature
Enhanced area clearing system (reduced respawns until player leaves area)
densitySystem: Improved balancing for Casual and Survivor daytime spawns
biomeAdditions: 47 new Swamp biome zombies and infected
Bloater/Vomit zombies added to Swamp region
New Swamp GRE Volatile that can initiate Chases
fixes: Swamp biome texture issues resolved
Swamp Goon attack and weapon loading corrected
Updated French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, and Spanish language support
Fixed invisible zombie spawns
Corrected Volatile Tyrant attack mechanics
Fixed Resting Volatile states
Hazmat and Worldburner Virals now immune to sunlight
Charger sunlight immunity restored
Interior Volatile and enemy spawn prevention in Darkzones
Screamer enemy callout functionality restored
Safezone bugs fixed (bed sleeping, enemy spawning)
Renegade bowman fire rate normalized
Custom Map Optional quest bugs addressed (Sofie quest, Windmill quest)
knownIssues: Armor visual clipping (material-level limitation)
Quest-specific archer behavior requiring savegame for debugging

visuals: 47 new Swamp biome zombies and infected
Bloater/Vomit zombies added to Swamp region
fixes: Swamp biome texture corruption resolved
Swamp Goon attack and weapon functionality restored
All invisible zombies eliminated
Volatiles and enemy Darkzone spawning corrected
Screamer position callout restored
Safezone functionality (bed sleeping, enemy prevention)
Renegade bowman fire rate normalized
Custom Map Optional quest compatibility improved
languages: Updated French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, and Spanish support
knownIssues: Armor visual clipping (engine limitation)
Quest-specific archer issues requiring savegame for debugging

fixes: Prologue zombie resting behavior corrected (new game only)

newFeature: Vanilla + IALR Content: New difficulty providing Mod Config, DiverseZ's, weapons, and armors
Excludes detection and AI changes
Feedback requested for balancing
difficultyAdjustments: Insanity: Improved runner/walker mix based on Mod Config
Ultimate Survivor: Nightwalkers active at night, mixed day spawns, increased non-Pack Leader Volatiles
Survivor: Reduced damage, improved spawn tables, fewer nighttime Volatiles
Casual Survivor: Restored from vanilla-only version with better balancing
fixes: Blob zombie visual glitch resolved
Invisible zombie spawns corrected
Map Custom Optional windmill quest compatibility (removed custom player house)
Remove Child Biters optional legless zombie walk prevention

difficultyRebalancing: Insanity: Significant difficulty increase, properly challenging
Survivor: Removed Day_Hunter system for exploration without chaos (Night_Hunter still active)
Ultimate: Day_Hunter system now active during day, Night_Hunter at night
Casual Survivor: Removed running biters, reduced overall spawn chaos
modConfigFixes: Runners and Walkers settings functional for Ultimate and Insanity
Climbers settings functional for Ultimate and Insanity
balanceAdjustments: Ultimate: No longer all-running biters, improved walker/runner balance
All difficulties: Rebalanced spawn pools with more Volatiles at night and Screamers
Ultimate and Insanity: Increased Hives and special infected in daytime interiors
special: Insanity: Minimum hit counts added (Volatiles: 6, Tyrants: 8, Demolishers: 8, Goons: 6)
fixes: Corrected Viral random spawn bug when running
Bow and crossbow damage display corrected
One-shot kill bug resolved across all difficulties
Human damage scaling improved with level progression
Renegade Sniper accuracy rebalanced (increased miss chance)
Legless visual biter walk animation removed (crawlers only)
Toxic cloud removed from green Plague Bearer faction deaths
Spawn system rebalancing for noise-based spawning
Demolisher, Goon, and Volatile day/night spawn increases via sound system
knownIssues: Warzones and Infestation modules may cause crashes pending vanilla bug fixes

newFeature: Trader Item Config: Mod Config section TRADER ITEM AMOUNT MODIFIERS
Min/Max value controls for trader inventory quantities
Increase or decrease item availability globally
IALR content added to all world traders

Awake virals in Darkzones (difficult, hard to stealth)
Human spawns in Darkzones (aggression/NPC teaming issues)
improvements: Better config options for spawn balancing (looting, exploration)

fixes: Ragdoll physics bugs corrected
Grapple mechanics improved
Density adjustments for better performance
Chase spawn table additions and balancing

newChaseSystem: Special zombies incorporated into chase events
Banshees, Goons, and Demolishers now climb and charge players
Dynamic chase encounters based on player actions
bansheeRework: Banshees stalk players after being summoned during chase
persistenceSystem: Special zombies spawned during chase may remain in area
Enemies persist even after player death and respawn
Creates ongoing threat in previously cleared areas
balance: Improved grenade mechanics
Faster walker movement speeds
Chase difficulty scaling

configurationSystem: New configuration system for storing settings across updates
AutoAim now toggle feature instead of forced setting
newZombieTypes: New female zombie variants for increased variety
Enhanced visual diversity across infected types
technicalImprovements: Improved hitboxes for all weapons and projectiles

completeHumanAIOverhaul: New types of human AI introduced
pkImprovements: All humans updated to use more bows for street clearing
realismImprovements: Enhanced human sensors for easier stealth missions
balanceChanges: Increased toxic and chemical biter effect areas by level

noiseSystemRework: Enhanced sensing when player is nearby
bugFixes: Howler bugs causing spawn glitches resolved

newIntensitySystem: Dynamic difficulty scaling based on player actions
specialZombieSpawning: Special zombies now spawn in world during exploration
Reduced human detection to support stealth gameplay
rareSpawnAdjustments: GRE Corruptors made very rare spawns

audioAndSpawnFixes: Fixed audio issues with running biters
interiorSpawning: Specials now spawn inside interiors during day
Specials now spawn inside interiors during night
foundationSystems: Spawn logic support for intense quests
